## IInterfaceBuilder.addBody() method

Adds a body to the interface - if multiple bodies are passed in, it merges the bodies together (but not an intersection type)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addBody<T extends IBodyType>(body: T): IInterfaceBuilder<Name, Generics, Combine<Body, T>, Exported, Extend>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  body | T | The body to pass in of type IBodyType |

<b>Returns:</b>

[IInterfaceBuilder](./tscgen.iinterfacebuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;Name, Generics, [Combine](./tscgen.combine.md)<!-- -->&lt;Body, T&gt;, Exported, Extend&gt;

A new interface builder with the specified body added
